headline: How active ETFs take in ‘outsized share’ of investor flows
summary: Exchange-traded fund (ETF) flows are hitting a record pace, but investor sentiment has shifted since the market bottom in April. Ben Slavin, BNY global head of ETFs, breaks down how flows into active management and digital assets are gaining momentum. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts. Editor's note: This post was updated to properly reflect the name of Mr. Slavin's employer.

content.title: How active ETFs take in ‘outsized share’ of investor flows

Exchange-traded fund (ETF) flows are hitting a record pace, but investor sentiment has shifted since the market bottom in April.

Ben Slavin, BNY global head of ETFs, breaks down how flows into active management and digital assets are gaining momentum.
